task.title: How to Make a Tomato Omelette
task.shortdesc: Make a healthy omelette for breakfast.

context.p: Javier needs to take care of himself, and part of that is making his own meals.

step.cmd: Turn on stovetop and place frying pan on the burner
Crack eggs against side of the bowl, making sure not to get any shell particles inside
Whisk the eggs in the bowl
Pour a small amount of oil into the pan
Pour mixed eggs into the pan. You will hear the pan sizzle â€“ this is a good thing.
Flip omelette over using spatula after two minutes
Make sure eggs are cooked and enjoy!
